# Plot with Not Applicable
```{r}
d <- d50[[1]] %>% #RRP has no missings -so use 1st imputed set
  select(Gender, starts_with("Q")) %>% select(1:12)
names(d) <- c("Gender", paste("QRP", 1:11, sep = ""))

a <- d %>% gather(key, value, -Gender, factor_key = TRUE) %>% 
  count(Gender, key, value) %>% 
  add_count(Gender, key, wt = n, name = "sum") %>% 
  mutate(Percentage = n/sum) %>% 
  mutate(Response = factor(value),
         Practices = key,
         Response = recode(Response, `0` = "Not Applicable", `1` = "1 Never", `7` = "7 Always")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Practices, y = Percentage, fill = Response)) +
  geom_bar(stat = 'identity', position = "stack", colour="black") +
  geom_col(position = position_stack(reverse = TRUE)) + 
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "RdBu", direction = -1) +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent) + 
  theme_minimal()  + 
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) + 
  facet_wrap(vars(Gender)) 

a

pdf(file = "Suppl_Fig2c_Gender.pdf", width = 10, height = 4)
a
dev.off()

postscript(file = "Suppl_Fig2c_Gender_large.eps", width = 10, height = 6)
a
dev.off()
```
